content: the london plane snowflake is part of the snowfall 2024 in the forest this snowflake is available for free on my blog 1 or in the pdf ebook of all 12 snowflake patterns here 2 read more about this pattern and view it free on my blog here 3 this pattern includes written instructions only and photo tutorial on stiffening snowflakes there are no charts for pattern support i recommend joining my facebook group jessica wifall s crochet studio 4 check out my other patterns in my ravelry store here 5 copyright 2024 by jessica wifall all rights reserved please do not sell redistribute republish or edit this pattern in any way translations and video tutorials are not allowed you may sell the finished products but may not use my photos to promote them please always credit me as the designer of this pattern 1 https //jessicawifall com/2024/12/06/london-plane-oak-snowflakes-snowfall-2024-cal-in-the-forest-day-1/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/snowfall-2024-
